attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have owned cars since 1973 and I have paid Road Tax (Vehicle Excise Duty), for every month of that time. Therefore I have no sympathy for motorists who do not buy Road Tax but continue to use their vehicle on public roads.
Some friends of mine have received an £80 fixed penalty notice for not notifying SORN, this is grossly unfair and should be stopped! It is yet another 'Stealth Tax'!
